body:
Looks like this pref is set in a `const` in a few places in the codebase, with different names:
https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/db5230a474f41daf1c3c45a33f103e90f2accd5a/recipe-client-addon/test/browser/browser_about_preferences.js#L6
https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/blob/935c526d77fb7892282e1883d5a5dd5e807b0101/recipe-client-addon/lib/ShieldPreferences.jsm#L24

Can it be shared? Other than that this seems ok... it's just reading the pref, it's sync, etc.
body_text:
Looks like this pref is set in a const in a few places in the codebase, with different names:

  
    
      normandy/recipe-client-addon/test/browser/browser_about_preferences.js
    
    
         Line 6
      in
      db5230a
    
    
    
    

        
          
           const FHR_PREF = "datareporting.healthreport.uploadEnabled"; 
        
    
  



  
    
      normandy/recipe-client-addon/lib/ShieldPreferences.jsm
    
    
         Line 24
      in
      935c526
    
    
    
    

        
          
           const FHR_UPLOAD_ENABLED_PREF = "datareporting.healthreport.uploadEnabled"; 
        
    
  


Can it be shared? Other than that this seems ok... it's just reading the pref, it's sync, etc.
body_html:
Looks like this pref is set in a const in a few places in the codebase, with different names:

normandy/recipe-client-addon/test/browser/browser_about_preferences.js

Line 6 in db5230a

const FHR_PREF = "datareporting.healthreport.uploadEnabled";

normandy/recipe-client-addon/lib/ShieldPreferences.jsm

Line 24 in 935c526

const FHR_UPLOAD_ENABLED_PREF = "datareporting.healthreport.uploadEnabled";

Can it be shared? Other than that this seems ok... it's just reading the pref, it's sync, etc.
